original_title: Karl Böhm in Rehearsal and Performance: Vol. 1: Don Juan (Wiener Philharmoniker)
overview: Acclaimed Austrian maestro Karl Böhm rehearses with the Vienna Philharmonic and leads the orchestra in a 1970 performance of composer Richard Strauss's "Don Juan, Op. 20" in this film, which captures Bohm's rehearsal and conducting techniques. Bohm, who was a friend of Strauss, regularly revived his operas and was an expert in interpreting the German composer's music, is seen here at his conducting best at the Musikvereinssaal.
title: Karl Böhm in Rehearsal and Performance: Vol. 1: Don Juan (Wiener Philharmoniker)
